mapper.insert: insert into card_data (id, cardData, userId, status, createDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.sql: v.id, v.userId, v.cardData, v.regType, v.`name`, v.mobile, v.idCard, v.createDate

FROM ( SELECT t.id, s.id as userId, 'student' as regType, t.cardData, s.`name`, s.mobile, s.idCard, t.createDate FROM card_data t, student s WHERE t.userId = s.id UNION ALL SELECT t.id, ta.id as userId, 'teacher' as regType, t.cardData, ta.`name`, ta.mobile, ta.idCard, t.createDate FROM card_data t, teacher ta WHERE t.userId = ta.id )v
mapper.select:
select v.regType, v.id, v.`name`, v.mobile, v.idCard from ( SELECT '学员' as regType, s.id, s.`name`, s.mobile, s.idCard FROM student s UNION ALL SELECT '教职工' as regType, ta.id, ta.`name`, ta.mobile, ta.idCard FROM teacher ta )v where 1=1
AND ( v.id = #{q,jdbcType=CHAR} or v.`name` LIKE concat('%', #{q,jdbcType=CHAR} ,'%') or v.mobile like concat('%', #{q,jdbcType=CHAR} ,'%') or v.idCard like concat('%', #{q,jdbcType=CHAR} ,'%') )
order by v.`name` LIMIT 10
mapper.update: update card_data set cardData = #{cardData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = now() where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
